serviceUrl.description: Rest service URL of the data source

listViewAttributes.description: List of columns to be shown in the list view

defaultView.description: Default view of cardListLayout, valid values are card or list

pageSize.description: No of cards to be shown per page, default is 15

cardFrontAttributes.description: List of columns to be shown in the card front view

cardBackAttributes.description: List of columns to be shown in the card back view

type.description: Card type i.e. simple, landscape, borderless

titleClickable.description: Title link flag i.e. true, false. True will make title a link

cardViewSelected.description: Event to be dispatched when card view is clicked

listViewSelected.description: Event to be dispatched when list view is clicked

cardClicked.description: Event to be dispatched when card title is clicked

cardTitle.description: parameter to be passed with cardTitleClicked event
